results.name: "Sloping septenary numbers": write numbers in septenary under each other (right-justified), read diagonals in upward direction, convert to decimal.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
xref: Cf. A102370 (base 2), A109681 (base 3), A325644 (base 4), A325645 (base 5), A325692 (base 6), this sequence (base 7), A325805 (base 8), A325829 (base 9), A103205 (base 10).
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 07 2019
